content.question: Which of the following correctly explains why resistor 1 has more current than each of the other resistors, whether or not the switch is closed?

choices.label: It is located farthest from the capacitor, which blocks current.
It is located closest to the battery.
It is the only resistor in series with the battery.

content.answer: It is the only resistor in series with the battery.

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
